thread.title: North Korea Releases South Korean Student Held Over Illegal Entry
thread.title_full: North Korea Releases South Korean Student Held Over Illegal Entry - WSJ

author: Alastair Gale
title: North Korea Releases South Korean Student Held Over Illegal Entry
text:
SEOULâ€”North Korea released a South Korean student it had held since April for illegal entry, a move that some experts said was intended to deflect attention from anticipated military provocations.
Joo Won-moon, a 21-year-old student at New York University, was handed to South Korean officials at the border outpost of Panmunjom around 5:30 p.m....
